Use [[Nurse Kes]] for MED and DIP nodes. Use one of [[Cadet Sito Jaxa]]/[[Ensign Ro]] for CMD or [[Ensign Seska]]/[[Lt Naomi Wildman]] for ENG. To Crit DIP use [[Sato]] and [[Major Kira]], [[Nurse Kes]]. To Crit SEC use [[Persis]]. When trying to crit 2nd MED node use [[Persis]] for both SEC and DIP. |- | '''Mission 5''':
[[Breakwater]] | [[File:away.png|24px|alt=Away Team|link=Away Team]] | 1 | 135 | 270 | 380 | {| style="margin:0 auto;white-space:nowrap" | style="width:108px" |No penalty in bypassing nodes that use [[File:CMD.png|alt=Command|Command|link=Command|18px]][[File:CMD.png|alt=Command|Command|link=|18px]]All paths require [[File:DIP.png|alt=Diplomacy|Diplomacy|link=Diplomacy|18px]][[File:DIP.png|alt=Diplomacy|Diplomacy|link=|18px]]

|} | 70 | 85 | ?? | 750 | 900 | ?? | 28 | 31 | ?? | [[Cadet Sito Jaxa]] should do CMD nodes. [[Persis]] is the only one who can crit SEC node [[Dabo Girl Leeta]] is the only one who can crit 2nd DIP node. No one can do first DIP node. Once nodes crit probably should revert to [[Lt Tasha Yar]] less chance for failure on SEC. [[Ensign Sato]] might be the better choice for DIP. However, [[Dabo Girl Leeta]] has the Civilian trait for last node which may allow her to succeed even with two failures. Not sure if [[Ensign Sato]] is 100% successful with one failure (Odds of [[Lt Tasha Yar]] failing 1 out of 81) |} To see lists of Eligible Crew for this page visit the page: [[A Certain Formality#Eligible Crew|Eligible Crew]]===[[Adv: United Federation]]=== {| class="wikitable mw-collapsible" style="text-align:center;" width="100%" |- ! style="width:10em;" | Name ! style="width:2em;" | Type ! style="width:2em;" | [[File:ticket.png|link=Tickets|alt=Tickets|Tickets|24px|x24px]] ! style="width:6em;" | Requirement ! style="width:120px" |Skills Used ! style="width:6em;" | Char XP ! style="width:7em;" | Credits [[File:credits_sm.png|link=Credits|alt=Credits|Credits|24px|x24px]] ! style="width:6em;" | Capt XP [[File:CaptainXP.png|25px|alt=Captain XP|Captain XP]] !
